name: The Empire's Legacy
description:
When civil war broke out, the emperor quickly put an end to it by casting a forbidden spell capable of destroying an entire nation. Now to stop the spell before it hits, the emperor must be defeated.

Build a party of fighters of various classes to go on an adventure to defeat the emperor himself lest the entire nation be doomed! Choose which battles to take along the way, and use items that you find to power up your crew. The journey won't be easy, can you really pull it off?

  • Build a team to fight monsters in automatic ATB-style battles
  • Use items to give your party members stat boosts
  • Choose which encounters to take and which classes to use
  • Free strategy guide included!!
